document.full_text: a trial designed to test whether a drug made by gilead sciences inc could prevent hiv infection in women at high risk of exposure to the virus was halted early after investigators determined it would probably not be effective.
document.title: hiv prevention study halted due to lack of benefit
lines_and_colors: a trial designed to test whether a drug made by gilead sciences inc could prevent hiv infection in women at high risk of exposure to the virus was halted early after investigators determined it would probably not be effective.
